content.webTitle: Arsenal's Jack Wilshere a major injury doubt for Bayern Munich match

fields.headline: Arsenal's Jack Wilshere a major injury doubt for Bayern Munich match
fields.bodyText: Jack Wilshere is a major injury doubt for Arsenal's Champions League match at Bayern Munich on Wednesday due to an ankle problem. The midfielder has been recuperating in Dubai after suffering the injury against Tottenham nine days ago and is not expected to fly to Germany on Tuesday with the squad. Arsenal trail 3-1 from the first leg. Arsenal's manager, Arsène Wenger, will address Wilshere's fitness on Tuesday, when it should become clearer whether the 21-year-old is in danger of being ruled out of England's World Cup qualifying double-header in San Marino and Montenegro, which starts a week on Friday. Lukas Podolski hopes to play against Bayern, one of his former clubs, despite revealing on Twitter he has a slight injury. The defender Bacary Sagna is also a doubt.
